page.title: 11YOUTH ACTIVITIES IN THORPE
page.content: THORPE-LE-SOKEN HAS THRIVING GUIDE, BROWNIE, SCOUT, VENTURE SCOUT AND CUB PACKS. THERE IS A RED CROSS YOUTH GROUP WHICH MEETS EVERY WEEK. IN ADDITION, ATTACHED TO TENDRING HIGH SCHOOL JUNIOR SECTION IS A YOUTH CENTRE WHICH PROVIDES MANY SPORTING AND LEISURE ACTIVITIES FOR YOUNG PEOPLE OVER THE AGE OF 14. THIS YOUTH CENTRE ORGANISES A JUNIOR CLUB FOR 9 TO 13 YEAR OLDS WHICH MEETS EVERY WEDNESDAY DURING TERM TIME. IT ALSO ARRANGES REGULAR DISCOS FOR SENIOR AND JUNIOR MEMBERS. ON SATURDAY MORNINGS THERE IS A GYMNASTICS CLUB FOR GIRLS BETWEEN THE AGES OF 5 AND 11, AND ONE FOR OLDER GIRLS ON WEDNESDAY EVENINGS. THE JUDO CLUB ON THURSDAYS CATERS FOR ALL AGES AND IS VERY POPULAR WITH THE BOYS.
